channel.title: How can i make a search engine for my site?
channel.description:
hey,
well im making a search directory system but im not to sure about the search engine....can anyone help?

item.title: How can i make a search engine for my site?
item.dc:creator: @itendsnow itendsnow
item.description:
@itendsnow wrote:

On Goggle:

Following words were ignored (too short or common): uk
The search "UK" did not match any documents

The search "england" did not match any documents

The search "sex" did not match any documents

The search "Refused" did not match any documents

..You know what? I Think i'll stick with Google for the time being.

item.title: How can i make a search engine for my site?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

if you're using php, and its for searching the news, which is in a db, then you could try something like this:
[php]<?php
$sql = "SELECT * FROM databasename WHERE someField LIKE '".$_POST['search']."' ";
$q = mysql_query($sql);

while($r = mysql_fetch_array($q)) {
echo "Title: $r['title'] Poster: $r['poster']";
}
[/php]
just try it out, if you need help then u can always pm me

Read full topic
